result.adr_address: Jockey Club House, Shan Kwong Rd, Happy Valley, Hong Kong
result.formatted_address: Jockey Club House, Shan Kwong Rd, Happy Valley, Hong Kong
result.name: Derby Restaurant & Bar

reviews.text: An elegant setting of an classic bar and restaurant.  Well stocked and great food.  Very friendly and knowledgeable staff. Long pants, no tees,  no slippers or open toed shoes for gents.

A wonderful degustation experience by Chef Casey McDonald... a budding superstar on using home grown garden ingredients ... flown all the way from New Zealand including self dried sea salt, home made butter, garden prickles, quince, custard leaf.... the beef short rib was heavenly superb... csn try them again when flying to Hawke Bay at the Craggy Range Restaurant at the Vineyard, incidentally has accommodation too.  2-4/5/19 at the Derby Restaurant.
Best service n place for tea n drinks music
Great food and fabulous wine list! A great venue for a romantic dinner.
Good food and service.. as always.

reviews.text:
不只是吃進肚的法國菜，
連看入眼簾的都很完美。
An elegant setting of an classic bar and restaurant.  Well stocked and great food.  Very friendly and knowledgeable staff. Long pants, no tees,  no slippers or open toed shoes for gents.

Wir durften zwei wunderbare Abende in dieser Bar verleben - tolle Stimmung , unglaublich freundliche Betreiber und - wir hatten Glück an einen Tag den Karaoke- Abend miterleben zu dürfen - so grundsätzlich nicht unseres - aber in dieser Bar - mit diesem Publikum einer der besten Abende die wir erlebt haben

A wonderful degustation experience by Chef Casey McDonald... a budding superstar on using home grown garden ingredients ... flown all the way from New Zealand including self dried sea salt, home made butter, garden prickles, quince, custard leaf.... the beef short rib was heavenly superb... csn try them again when flying to Hawke Bay at the Craggy Range Restaurant at the Vineyard, incidentally has accommodation too.  2-4/5/19 at the Derby Restaurant.
Best service n place for tea n drinks music

result.adr_address: Valley Centre, 80-82 Morrison Hill Rd, Wan Chai, Hong Kong
result.formatted_address: Valley Centre, 80-82 Morrison Hill Rd, Wan Chai, Hong Kong
result.name: The Derby Pub & Restaurant

reviews.text: Loved this pub. It's cozy and wasn't that busy on early Friday night. Ordered a steak sandwich and it was awesome. They have ciders from australia as well.

Neat little pub - stopped in for a few beers before the Sevens. Good service and attitude - just a tip though, the credit card minimum is HK$200, but they were great and let me pay for a couple of drinks ahead. So either bring cash or expect to have a couple drinks! 😆
Friendly staff and good food. Oh, and cold beers. I would definitely go back here.

A great little pub of longstanding. First time here in ages. Our group ate Salmon Baguette, mixed Grill, Steak Baguette and Calamari. Each person felt the standard and Quality were quite high. If you're in HK for Rugby 7's do try this traditional pub. It's 3 minutes walk from Dorsett Hotel Wanchai/ Happy Valley. 10 mins walk from So Kon Po ( The stadium).

This is a proper pub right across from the Jockey Club. Proper pints, filled properly, it’s a home from home with aspects of Irish and English pubs. The service is superb - this is our second time here on our brief stay in Hong Kong and the staff recognised us immediately from two nights ago. Warm, friendly atmosphere. What more do you want!? Ooh - happy hour with excellent reductions on drinks. Love it here.

result.vicinity: Valley Centre, 80-82 Morrison Hill Road, Wan Chai

午餐不算貴，質素也可以
又貴set lunch 無餐湯要65元,食品差過以往
通常和同事去食午餐，附近無乜餐廳，而這間水準一般，價錢屬正常。
